sentences.en: A fully fledged currency requires both a central bank and a Treasury.
sentences.cn: 完善的货币要求央行和财政部两者兼备.

sentences.en: And it has opened a fully - fledged branch of the Sorbonne, the Paris university.
sentences.cn: 同时,这里还设立了巴黎大学的分校, 教学条件相当成熟.

sentences.en: As soon as the rain stops , a young sparrow, almost full fledged, comes to the courtyard.
sentences.cn: 雨后, 院里来了个麻雀, 刚长全了羽毛.

sentences.en: At worst, it could turn into a full - fledged pandemic.
sentences.cn: 最坏的情况是转变成全面爆发的流行疫病.

sentences.en: By the age of seventeen I was a full - fledged atheist.
sentences.cn: 到十七岁时,我已经完全成为一名无神论者.

sentences.en: Computer science is now a fully - fledged academic subject.
sentences.cn: 计算机科学目前已是一门成熟的学科.

sentences.en: Despite this spectacular demonstration, Tesla never converted his remote - control boat into a full - fledged weapon.
sentences.cn: 尽管有这次耸动的表演, 特士拉从没能将他的遥控船化为完整的武器.

sentences.en: She has sought to turn that fame into a full - fledged business empire.
sentences.cn: 她试图把这种名望转变为成熟的商业帝国.

sentences.en: the emergence of a fully fledged market economy
This is not a demand for a full - fledged essay.
sentences.cn: 并不要求你把它写成完整、丰富的正式论文.

sentences.en: With directly connection, your computer will be a full - fledged Internet host, with its own electronic address.
sentences.cn: 利用直接与因特网连接的方式, 你的这台计算机就会是一台正式的因特网主机, 有它自己的电子地址.

words.tran_cn: 无经验的人；刚会飞的幼鸟
成熟的；快会飞的；羽毛丰满的

trans.tran_cn: （鸟）长羽毛( fledge的过去式和过去分词 )，给（箭）装上羽毛，把（小鸟）养到能够飞翔，用羽毛[绒羽]装饰
